name: Parzz’val
description: Parzz’val is a large aberration that embodies chaos. Its skin is covered in a sticky, acidic webbing that it uses to create difficult terrain. With oversized fists and an exceptionally large maw, it looks formidable and threatening.
memorable: Its ability to create caustic webs and regenerate health makes Parzz’val a dangerous opponent, capable of controlling the battlefield and sustaining itself in combat.
goals: To dominate its territory and overpower intruders using strategic web placement and devastating attacks.
relations: Could be encountered with other chaotic aberrations or creatures attracted to its chaotic evil nature.
environment: Typically found in chaotic, unstable, or warped environments that reflect its turbulent nature.
strengths: Exceptional strength and significant regeneration abilities; can create difficult terrain with its caustic web.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to thunder damage but immune to most physical attacks from non-magical sources.
attacks: Multiattack using powerful oversized fists and a dangerous oversized maw that can swallow smaller creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Caustic Web creates zones of difficult terrain that can deal persistent acid damage to those within it.
senses: Has blindsight out to 120 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without needing to see them.
skills: Proficient in stealth, giving it an advantage in hiding from enemies.
additional_information: Regenerates 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns.
Can gain advantage on melee attacks after dealing damage with multiple attacks in one round.
Can swallow creatures smaller than itself, blinding and restraining them while dealing continuous acid damage.
The web it creates does not affect itself but hinders enemies trying to navigate through it.
Sustains high melee damage potential due to its exceptional strength.
test_queries: monster that regenerates health in combat
creature that can swallow its enemies
